properties.publicRemarks: If you're looking  to find 180 degree MOUNTAIN and CITIES views and  PRIVACY, this is the home for  YOU!!  This lovely lower level Casa Vista is move in ready.  The enclosed patio room adds 200+ additional square footage, providing more room for entertaining your family and friends.  The home has been upgraded with laminate flooring, granite flooring in kitchen, Granite counter tops, recessed lighting in the kitchen, ,crown molding , RO-PURE  water filtration system in the kitchen.  The guest bedroom / office bathroom has been remolded with a tiled walk-in shower.  The primary  bedroom offers a large walk-in closet, with beautiful views of the mountains and valley.  Located in Laguna Woods, enjoy all the amenities the Village has to offer:  27 holes of golf plus separate 9-hole walking course, driving range, tennis courts, pickleball courts, 5 swimming pools, 3 fitness centers, card rooms, 7 club houses, over 200 social clubs to participate in and so much more. There is FREE bus transportation.  The unit includes: water, trash, basic cable, landscaping, and exterior building maintenance plus access to all of the Laguna Woods Village Facilities. Laguna Beach is only a few minutes away.  Laguna Woods is VERY close to great shopping and restaurants.  Come and see this beautiful home.
